traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Scintillating Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of brilliant radiance in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw, taking 40 (9d8 damage) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon then gains 15 temporary hit points by absorbing a portion of the radiant energy.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The dragon makes one Claw attack.

legendary.name: Psionics (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon uses Psychic Step or Spellcasting.

legendary.name: Starlight Strike (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The dragon releases a searing beam of starlight at a creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 31 ({@damage 9d6}) radiant damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):
